title: Clear Data Sharing Summaries
task: Expect clear and simple summaries about data sharing from ALFRED
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to share all my health data without limits so I feel open and safe.

title: Challenge in Physical Therapy Exercises
task: Engages actively with ALFRED for physical therapy
summary: As an older person, I want to do harder physical therapy exercises to challenge myself and improve my health.
